course_title: Fresh Sem: Africn Amer Studies: Blk.Wom.&thePolitics of Beauty
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 18 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: Topic: Black Women and the Politics of Beauty. The course examines how constructions of race and gender control the way Black women are represented in literature, film and popular culture from the 19th c. to the present.
course_description: Variable topics in African American Studies.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in Emerson Chemistry Bldg. E102
